metadata.dc:author: Iturbe, F
Adiego, M I
Ascaso, F J
Vallés, H
Palomar, A
Huerva, V
metadata.dc:description: Usher's syndrome is an autosomal, recessively inherited trait that combines a congenital hearing impairment with retinitis pigmentosa. The AA. present the cases of two brothers affected. The actual classification and the last etiopathogenic theories are revised.
metadata.dc:title: Síndrome de Usher. A propósito de dos casos.
[Usher syndrome. Two case reports].
